metadata.Title: CVE-2019-18890 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
A SQL injection vulnerability in Redmine through 3.2.9 and 3.3.x before3.3.10 allows Redmine users to access protected information via a craftedobject query.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-18890` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

redmine - 3.4.4-1
redmine-mysql - 3.4.4-1
redmine-pgsql - 3.4.4-1
redmine-sqlite - 3.4.4-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: redmine package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.4.4-1').
